title: Board Game

title: Mega Trainer

title: Supermower
description: A fun project I made in Python after I first learned about mazes. This was probably the best project I created in Python as I tried to make it as polished as possible.

title: Asteroids
description: I created a really buggy version of asteroids just to see if I could do it. I didn't put much heart into it as I was busy with school, but it was meant to be a proof of concept.
